approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

addToWhitelist.description: Adds an address to the whitelist with a specified limit.

removeFromWhitelist.description: Removes an address from the whitelist.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a specified address.

forceReleaseStaking.description: Forces the release of staking based on the specified release type.

prepareDistribution.description: Prepares the distribution for a specified round.

prepareDistributionPrecise.description: Prepares the distribution for a specified round with precise price limits.

updateAndGetCurrentPrice.description: Updates and retrieves the current price.

setDEXEFeed.description: Sets the DEXE price feed address.

setETHFeed.description: Sets the ETH price feed address.

setUSDTFeed.description: Sets the USDT price feed address.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

withdrawLocked.description: Withdraws locked tokens from the contract to a specified address.
